greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of distinct primes of the form 4k+1 dividing n minus number of distinct primes of the form 4k+3 dividing n.
link: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..10000
formula: Additive with a(p^e) = 0 if p = 2, 1 if p = 1 (mod 4), -1 if p = 3 (mod 4).
program: a005094 n = a005089 n - a005091 n  -- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jan 07 2013
xref: Cf. A079635 (difference when counted with multiplicity).
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
ext: More precise definition from _Antti Karttunen_, Feb 03 2016
